channel.title: Banned on steam discussions for threats?
channel.description: Hello, I am not sure if this is the right place to ask but I was just banned on the steam forums for apparently "suggesting death threats". But not only have I never threatened anyone on there but I don't believe I've even ever commented on a discussion on there. So I'm not sure why i am banned? Hopefully a mod or someone can look at it. Thank you much

item.title: Banned on steam discussions for threats?
item.dc:creator: lbherrick
item.description:
Oh ok, no problem! I was just really confused lol, glad its figured out though. Thank you guys

Read full topic
item.source: Banned on steam discussions for threats?

item.title: Banned on steam discussions for threats?
item.dc:creator: bkdale86
item.description:
Sorry that was probably me, the steam reporting is unclear who posted vs reported.

Read full topic
item.source: Banned on steam discussions for threats?

item.title: Banned on steam discussions for threats?
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
It seems you were erroneously banned for reporting a post. I think one of the admins must have misclicked on the report or something, accidentally banning the reporter rather than the person reported. Silly us! I have unbanned you. Sorry about that.

Read full topic
